content: easy breezy summer wrap and throw duo - designed by juan the yarn addict materials used abbreviations/meanings for wrap approx 2 5 skeins big twist yarn chain - chain for throw approx 5 skeins big twist yarn double_crochet double_crochet big twist yarn is 380yds / 6oz / 347m / 170g skip - skip or any 4 wt yarn of your choice st stitch/stitches 6 5 mm hook instructions start by chaining 78 for the wrap or 178 for the throw row 2 1 double_crochet in the 3rd chain from hook and in each chain until end chain 3 and turn row 3 insert iris stitch 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet into 3rd stitch * skip 4 st insert iris st into next st repeat from * until last st 1 double_crochet in last st chain 5 and turn row 4 insert a v_stitch 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in the center of the iris stitch from the previous row chain 2 and repeat until the end 1 double_crochet in the chain space chain 3 and turn * repeat row 3 and 4 for 100 row or until desired length is achieved last row 1 double_crochet in every stitch and chain space for the row totaling 75 double_crochet for the wrap or 175 double_crochet for the throw tie off and sew in ends enjoy this pattern is property of juan the yarn addict owner of jtya designs llc all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of juan the yarn addict you may use this pattern for personal non-commercial use only sales of the finished product are permitted with credit given to juan the yarn addict no part of this document may be reproduced altered distributed or otherwise shared in any form or by any other means
